price: আল্লাহৰ বাহিৰে কোনেও ইয়াক প্ৰকাশ কৰিবলৈ সক্ষম নহয়।
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
